results.title: Insulin resistance and response to antiviral therapy in chronic hepatitis C: mechanisms and management.
results.text_hl: A recent controlled, randomized, double-blind clinical trial (TRIC-1) examined the effect of adding @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to standard therapy in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hepatitis_C_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019698 @@@hepatitis C.@@@ This study demonstrated that @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ infected with @SPECIES_11103 @@@hepatitis C virus@@@ genotype 1 and HOMA >2 treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed a greater drop in viral load during the first 12 weeks and a doubled sustained viral response in comparison with females receiving placebo.
